definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Bartender and a few bold people who followed him out.
sentences.chinese: 酒保和幾個大膽的人跟在他身後走了出去。

sentences.english: You know that how much strenuous effortses have to bartender spend to create the coffee of Ireland?
sentences.chinese: 你知道酒保得花多少心血來創造愛爾蘭咖啡嗎？

sentences.english: The successful businessman used to work as a bartender while in college.
sentences.chinese: 這位成功的商人念大學時曾當過酒保。

sentences.english: The bartender comes over and refuses service to the man and again offers to call a cab.
sentences.chinese: 酒保過來說不能給他酒喝，再次提議幫他叫部計程車。

sentences.english: Most pubs have no waiters——you have to go to the bar to buy drinks.
sentences.chinese: 大多數英國酒吧都沒有酒保，你得到吧檯去買酒。

sentences.english: The bartender is a blonde girl with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 酒保是一個帶着棒球棒的金髮女人。

sentences.english: How did you get interested in being a bartender?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼會喜歡做酒保呢？

sentences.english: Each time he gave the bartender a good tip.
sentences.chinese: 每次他都給酒保優厚的小費。

sentences.english: Well, this woman belonged to the bartender, and my girlfriend was being ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這個女的只是酒保而已，我女朋友卻很好小。

sentences.english: Jen: The barman says to the horse "Why the long face?""
sentences.chinese: 酒保對那匹馬說，你的臉爲什麼這麼長？

sentences.english: The bartender, concerned because it was so cold, went to check on her.
sentences.chinese: 外面很冷，酒保有點擔心，便出去看看情況。

sentences.english: He moved to Hollywood, where he drove a cab and worked as a bartender.
sentences.chinese: 隨後他搬到了好萊塢，在那兒開出租車，當酒保。

sentences.english: On more than three occasions in the last month I have had to request that my pint be topped up to a full measure.
sentences.chinese: 上個月就有不止三次我要酒保給我的酒要添滿。

sentences.english: The waiter serves only the best food, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，酒保只端來最佳的伙食。

sentences.english: He sold him three Scotch and waters in ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在十分鐘裏，酒保就賣給了小夥三杯加水威士忌。

definition: abbr. for 侍應生|侍应生[shi4 ying4 sheng1]
(old) (in a tavern or inn etc) waiter/attendant
